Package sustech.cs304.AIDE.repository

Interface AnnounceRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Announce,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Announce,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Announce,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Announce,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Announce,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Announce>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Announce,Long>
public interface AnnounceRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Announce,Long>
Repository interface for managing Announce entities. This interface extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and custom queries.
